learningOverview.title: Overview: Benefits of structured content
learningOverview.shortdesc: Learn about the benefits of structured content for learning and training.

lcIntro.title: Introduction
lcIntro.p: Learning content has specific goals and purposes, which can be achieved by using planned organization and structure during the writing process.

lcAudience.title: Audience
lcAudience.p: The target audience for this lesson includes anyone interested in adopting structured writing for their content.

lcDuration.title: Duration
lcDuration.lcTime: It should take no more than 20 minutes to complete this lesson.

lcObjectives.title: Objectives
lcObjectives.lcObjectivesStem: When you complete this lesson, you'll know how to do the following:

lcObjectivesGroup.lcObjective: State reasons why XML has benefits for learning content.
Give an example of how a learning object structure promotes instructional integrity for learning content.
